mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lp_cargo ( cid, cargo_name, cargo_price, cargo_type, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{cid}, #{cargoName}, #{cargoPrice}, #{cargoType}, 0 );
mapper.select: select lpc.cid as cid, lpc.cargo_name as cargoName, lpc.cargo_price as cargoPrice, lpc.is_deleted as isDeleted from lp_cargo lpc where lpc.is_deleted=0 and cargo_name = #{cargoName}
